QuestData.Title: Bearers of Bad News
QuestData.Description:
We must report this attack to Lord Admiral Katherine Proudmoore and prove to her that Lady Ashvane is behind it.
It won't be easy... Lady Ashvane and Katherine Proudmoore have been close friends for years.
Quickly, let us make for Boralus!
QuestData.RewardText: It seems word of the attack has already reached Boralus.
